titleStmt.title: The refusers of peace unexcusable: in answer to a libell against His maiesties late messages for peace.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Leonard Lichfield, printer to the Vniversity.,

notesStmt.note: "An answer to a catechism propounded in the Mercurius Britannicus during December, 1645, .. On a copy in the Bodleian is written in a contemporary hand 'Printed att Oxon. December 29. 1645. by the Kings Commaund in Answer to a Mercurius Britannicus'"--Madan.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
